pricing.title: Plans That Adapt to Your Goal
pricing.subtitle: Choose the ideal plan for your fitness journey. All plans include 30-day guarantee.

q1.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your plan anytime without additional fees. Your access remains active until the end of the paid period.

q2.question: Is there a free trial period?
q2.answer: We offer 7 days free for all plans. No credit card required to start.

q3.question: Can I change plans later?
q3.answer: Sure! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. We adjust the amount proportionally.

q4.question: Do workouts work offline?
q4.answer: Yes, you can download workouts and use offline. Synchronization happens when you connect again.

q5.question: Is there a satisfaction guarantee?
q5.answer: We offer a 30-day guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we return 100% of your money.

q6.question: How does medical support work?
q6.answer: Our Premium and Enterprise plans include monitoring with certified health professionals.

cta.title: Still have questions about which plan to choose?
cta.subtitle: Our team is ready to help you find the perfect plan
